com.team23.weather.configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.configuration.ConfigurationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConfigurationManager

    public class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConfigurationManager
    This class implements IConfigurationManager. It stores the Configuration object to disk and reads it from there.
    Author:
    Saquib Mian
